#summary This page will explain 8086 architecture.
#labels Phase-Design,Phase-Implementation,Featured

= Introduction =

[http://i219.photobucket.com/albums/cc244/leonardoaraujo/80186_arch.png]

The 8086 is a 16-bit processor divided in three parts (BIU,EU,AU) it has 20-bit address bus capable of addressing 1Mb of memory divided in cells of one byte.


= Details =

[http://i219.photobucket.com/albums/cc244/leonardoaraujo/8086.gif]

8086 Parts
  * BIU(Bus Interface Unit)
  * EU(Executing Unit)
  * AU(Addressing Unit)
